pkgmetadata.longdescription: Graph-Constrained Estimation and Hypothesis Tests // Use the graph-constrained estimation (Grace) procedure (Zhao and Shojaie, 2016 doi:10.1111/biom.12418) to estimate graph-guided linear regression coefficients and use the Grace/GraceI/GraceR tests to perform graph-guided hypothesis tests on the association between the response and the predictors.
